column5: Hey Fellow Addicts!  Just curious if the run is still going on @ the CREDIT RIVER in MISSISSAUGA. Anyone been there recently? Myself, a Buddy and my Brother are planning on going there this Sunday...  Any input would be greatly appreciated....  Thanks! Rob
Rob don't waste your time brother it's brown and flooded right now. i was there this morning with my little girl for a walk nothing but dark brown water
Yeah eh? You think the waters will clear up by Sunday Jose? Its supposed to be nice this weekend (no rain)...?
From what i see it should be good in 3 to 4 days tops but i could be wrong. I would head up to simco and give the crappie a go or orillia for some perch  Good luck on what ever you deside Rob

ok seriously ROb stay away from the credit river....the tourney was postponed due to it being in a flood stage......I am sure you guys can find something....if you don't believe me check out the General discussion a tourney was cancelled  due to the conditions I wish you only good fortunes my friend!  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=31565
don't waste your time I was suppost to fish the tourney tomorrow and if they postpone that then it is WAY to bad to fish

Hey Guys...  Just wanted to RE-ASK this question in regards to TOMORROW (May 30th, 2009).... Anyone know if the fish are still running? Hopefully I can get a response BEFORE tomorrow lunchtime.  Thanks in Advance, Rob

Running up?  Probably not Dropping back - Most definitely  With the rain we've had the last few days I wouldn't be surprised if the main river is flowing high and dirty right now.  It will probably be like that for a few more days depending on which parts of the river you go to
there can't be many rainbows left in any trib... maybe i'm wrong... i've found that my late may it's pretty much over..
eeeps ummmm yea Rain sucks..but tis a beautiful day..never know

I saw two trout come out of different spots of a trib on Friday, hell on the Niagara & Grand there's bows almost year round.  Not alot but they're there.  One of the fish on Friday was still spewing milt!
No luck whatsoever... Waters were all merky... even up till the mouth of Lake O - Couldn't even cast that far out...
If I could whisper words of wisdom...  Let it be.  HD
haha! funny  yes, there are always a few late spawners, but at least 90% of the run is done by the end of May.  p.-
